short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you find quality links, and debunk bad links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Users of the Reasoned Discussions website can add this extension to their browsing to help them quickly and easily identify good or bad pages. Look up the page you're currently browsing to see if it has already been reviewed on Reasoned Discussions, or add your own take to the page yourself. Find out the quality of the page you're on, or of the entire website. Find the author of an article and see if they have written anything else that has been reviewed.

There's a lot of bad information out there. Help yourself and others identify the quality information from the rest.
